{"blocks":[{"key":"m56e","text":"The water production for AWARE main activities includes three stages – disinfection by ultraviolet C radiation (UVC), storage for - (according to water load and season) and ozonation. The water quality is monitored at these three stages, for the parameters indicated in Figure 1 below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":129,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ej0b5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2uv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dmg74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":43200,"guid":"7435E1D80B7311EFB6020A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"8F46313E0B7311EFB6020A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":260,"id":466401,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"enfqn\",\"text\":\"Figure 1. {"blocks":[{"key":"c1i21","text":"Sampling, Processing, and Analyses ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cidbo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4956","text":"Water samples are collected (see Figure 2) and processed within a interval, before being shipped for the partner responsible for the analyses (Table 1). In case no processing is needed, samples are frozen and stored at within .\nFor each sampling event, the date, day of the week and hour; the temperature and rain. Sampling points, indicated in Figure 2 were designated from A to I:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":218,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":225,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"37hbl","text":"- Influent of primary treatment (A) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd6rb","text":"- Influent of biological treatment (activated sludge) (B) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8id7r","text":"- Treated secondary effluent (C) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftv2j","text":"- Sand filter effluent (D) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehe6r","text":"- UVC effluent (E) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i9i4","text":"- Storage for reuse tank effluent (F) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9dao","text":"- Ozonation effluent (1 dose, e.g.,  O3) -
